Miscellaneous Highlights: The game between the Cleveland Guardians and the Houston Astros was canceled due to rain on September 29, 2024, at Progressive Field.
The cancellation of the game means that José Ramírez will not have the opportunity to become Cleveland's first 40/40/40 hitter.
The next time Cleveland will take the field is October 5 in Game 1 of the American League Division Series.
The Houston Astros must first advance past Detroit in the AL Wild Card series which begins on Tuesday.
Others: Ticketholders for Sunday's game who purchased through CLEGuardians.com or the MLB Ballpark app will receive a credit amount for their tickets on their MyTickets account that can be used towards a 2024 postseason game or a 2025 regular season game.
